<template>
    <canvas id="gobang" ></canvas>
</template>

<script>
import {onMounted} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "chessboard",
  setup(){
    onMounted(()=>{
        // 画棋盘
      let container=document.getElementById("gobang");
      container.width=800;
      container.height=800;
      let ctx=container.getContext("2d");
      //ctx.translate(70,70);
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.fillStyle = "#fff";
        //ctx.rect(0, 0, 50, 50);
        ctx.fill();
        ctx.stroke();
      for (var i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.strokeStyle = "#D6D1D1";
        ctx.moveTo(15 + i * 45, 15); //垂直方向画15根线，相距30px;
        ctx.lineTo(15 + i * 45, 435);
        ctx.stroke();
        ctx.moveTo(15, 15 + i * 45); //水平方向画15根线，相距30px;棋盘为14*14；
        ctx.lineTo(435, 15 + i * 45);
        ctx.stroke();
        //resultArr.push(new Array(15).fill(0));
      }
    })
  }
}
</script>
